nodes.title: SecureTea Project
nodes.introduction: SecureTea Project provides a one-stop security solution for various devices(personal computers/servers / IoT devices), I contributed the following features to the Project to make it better.

nodes.title: Bitcoin Simulator
nodes.introduction: Bitcoin Simulator - BlockChain Implementation in Javascript Language along with implementation of OOPs Concepts. A Decentralised network and Secure system to demonstrate the Working of blockchain.
